Title: The health facilities of New China
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A five-poster series from 1952.The photographs show a doctor examing a patient; medical students at Shandong University; medical students; a pharmaceutical production unit; medical workers preparing for their trip to North Korea; medical supplies on their way to North Korea.
